message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product and am willing to pay $95 for it.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. It's a great product, and I think it's worth every penny.
I understand your perspective, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I am willing to pay $100 for it.
